comment: /**  * Determine if the condition matches.  * @param context the condition context  * @param metadata metadata of the {@link org.springframework.core.type.AnnotationMetadata class}  * or {@link org.springframework.core.type.MethodMetadata method} being checked  * @return {@code true} if the condition matches and the component can be registered,  * or {@code false} to veto the annotated component's registration  */
code: /**  * Determine if the condition matches.  * @param context the condition context  * @param metadata metadata of the {@link org.springframework.core.type.AnnotationMetadata class}  * or {@link org.springframework.core.type.MethodMetadata method} being checked  * @return {@code true} if the condition matches and the component can be registered,  * or {@code false} to veto the annotated component's registration  */ boolean matches(ConditionContext context, AnnotatedTypeMetadata metadata).
